name: pushillade
description:
Eliminate all the niderite crystals by pushing one onto another. Avoid ants, open doors with keys, oh my. You can even try to kill ants with niderite, but it's not easy.

Controls: arrow keys, or WSAD, or clicking near the border (annoying). If the controls do not work, open it in new tab/window http://drcz.github.io/mini-ld-67/

This is very short game made for mini Ludum Dare 67, actually a remix of my older game, who cares...
